name: RESISTANT
description:
Made for the GameJam "Level UP Circle: Beginner Jam #2"

Play as Lieutenant Antwon Colony, legendary spy who was inspiration for the fictional character, Ant Bond. You've served your time but your colony needs you back in action, are you ready to leave your wife and kids behind to travel the world, discover other cultures and engage in intercolonial espionage?

Programming - Susej

Art - StormTruck

Extra special thanks to the following people for their contribution

Lime   (Comic "cutscene")

Sami A.   (Music)

Horus & ShyFrost   (Programming support)

Lazer  (AntQueen Voice)

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Space - Destroy Food / Egg

R - Restart Scene / Level

ESC - Return to Main Menu
